articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Darya Dugina's death sheds light on the women fronting Russia's propaganda machine
articles.description: Darya Dugina, who died in a car bomb explosion outside Moscow, was one of a number of influential Russian women on the front lines of Russia's disinformation war, representing the public face of a wider propaganda effort at home and abroad.

articles.author: CNN staff
articles.title: READ: Trump team's response in request for special master
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump responded Friday to a judge's request that he elaborate on his request that the court appoint a "special master" to oversee the review of evidence recovered from the search of his Mar-a-Lago residence. Read the filing below.

articles.title: Biden scoffs at Trump's declassification claims
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Friday mocked his predecessor's claims that all the classified material brought with him to his South Florida home had been declassified beforehand.

articles.description: A redacted version of the Mar-a-Lago search warrant affidavit has been unsealed by the Justice Department, as ordered by a federal judge. Jessica Schneider gives the details on CNN Inside Politics.

articles.title: Justice Department releases redacted Mar-a-Lago search warrant affidavit
articles.description: The Justice Department on Friday released a redacted version of the Mar-a-Lago search warrant affidavit.
